alert.note: Alert for Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 2:34AM EST until January 11 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban area and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northern Connecticut, including Tolland and Windham Counties. In Massachusetts, Hampden and Worcester Counties. * WHEN...Until 800 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of urban areas, smaller rivers, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 232 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Flooding is expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible through 8 AM. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Worcester, Shrewsbury, Mansfield, Windham, Plainfield, Westborough, Grafton, Willimantic, Killingly, Holden, Webster, Southbridge, Auburn, Northbridge, Oxford, Clinton, Millbury, Charlton, Coventry and Spencer. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
